name: Panty and Stocking Steam Background (customisable)
description: when you bored of your steam background, but you don't have money and want to make your own profile. this is allow you to use your own image to be steam background.
additional_info:
To change to your own image change http://i.imgur.com/GTzQffY.jpg to your own image url
